com.tingyik90.snackprogressbar

Class SnackProgressBarManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tingyik90.snackprogressbar.SnackProgressBarManager

  • public class SnackProgressBarManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class handling all the SnackProgressBars added.

    This class queues the SnackProgressBars to be shown. It will dismiss the SnackProgressBar according to its desired duration before showing the next in queue.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SnackProgressBarManager.OnDisplayListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the SnackProgressBar is shown or dismissed.

    • Field Detail

      • ACTION_COLOR_DEFAULT

        public static final int ACTION_COLOR_DEFAULT
        Default action text color as per Material Design i.e. R.color.colorAccent.

      • BACKGROUND_COLOR_DEFAULT

        public static final int BACKGROUND_COLOR_DEFAULT
        Default SnackProgressBar background color as per Material Design.

      • LENGTH_INDEFINITE

        public static final int LENGTH_INDEFINITE
        Show the SnackProgressBar indefinitely. Note that this will be changed to LENGTH_SHORT and dismissed if there is another SnackProgressBar in queue before and after.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LENGTH_LONG

        public static final int LENGTH_LONG
        Show the SnackProgressBar for a long period of time.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        Show the SnackProgressBar for a short period of time.
        See Also:

        Default message text color as per Material Design.

        public static final int PROGRESSBAR_COLOR_DEFAULT
        Default progressBar color as per Material Design i.e. R.color.colorAccent.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SnackProgressBarManager

        public SnackProgressBarManager(android.view.View view)
        Constructor. If possible, the root view of the activity should be provided and can be any type of layout. The constructor will loop and crawl up the view hierarchy to find a suitable parent view if non-root view is provided.

        If a CoordinatorLayout is provided, the FloatingActionButton will animate with the SnackProgressBar. Else, setViewsToMove(View[]) needs to be called to select the views to be animated. Note that setViewsToMove(View[]) can still be used for CoordinatorLayout to move other views.

        Swipe to dismiss behaviour can be set via SnackProgressBar.setSwipeToDismiss(boolean). This is provided via BaseTransientBottomBar for CoordinatorLayout, but provided via SnackProgressBarLayout for other layout types.

        Parameters:
        view - View to hold the SnackProgressBar.

    • Method Detail

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss()
        Dismisses the currently showing SnackProgressBar and show the next in queue.

      • dismissAll

        public void dismissAll()
        Dismisses all the SnackProgressBar that is in queue. The currently shown SnackProgressBar will also be dismissed.

      • getLastShown

        public SnackProgressBar getLastShown()
        Retrieves the SnackProgressBar that is currently or was showing.
        Returns:
        SnackProgressBar that is currently or was showing. Return null if nothing was ever shown.

      • getSnackProgressBar

        public SnackProgressBar getSnackProgressBar(int storeId)
        Retrieves the SnackProgressBar that was previously added into SnackProgressBarManager.
        Parameters:
        storeId - StoreId of the SnackProgressBar stored in SnackProgressBarManager.
        Returns:
        SnackProgressBar of the storeId. Can be null.
        See Also:
        put(SnackProgressBar, int)

      • put

        public void put(@NonNull
                SnackProgressBar snackProgressBar,
                int storeId)
        Stores a SnackProgressBar into SnackProgressBarManager to perform further action. The SnackProgressBar is uniquely identified by the storeId and will be overwritten by another SnackProgressBar with the same storeId.
        Parameters:
        snackProgressBar - SnackProgressBar to be added.
        storeId - StoreId of the SnackProgressBar to be added.
        See Also:
        SnackProgressBar, getSnackProgressBar(int)

                                                  int colorId)
        Sets the action text color.
        Parameters:
        colorId - R.color id.
        See Also:
        ACTION_COLOR_DEFAULT

        public SnackProgressBarManager setBackgroundColor(@ColorRes

        Sets the SnackProgressBar background color.
        Parameters:

        See Also:

        public SnackProgressBarManager setMessageTextColor(@ColorRes
                                                   int colorId)
        Sets the message text color.
        Parameters:

        See Also:

      • setOnDisplayListener

        public SnackProgressBarManager setOnDisplayListener(SnackProgressBarManager.OnDisplayListener onDisplayListener)
        Registers a callback to be invoked when the SnackProgressBar is shown or dismissed.
        Parameters:
        onDisplayListener - The callback that will run. This value may be null.

      • setOverlayLayoutAlpha

        public SnackProgressBarManager setOverlayLayoutAlpha(float overlayLayoutAlpha)
        Sets the transparency of the OverlayLayout which blocks user input.
        Parameters:
        overlayLayoutAlpha - Alpha between 0f to 1f. Default = 0.8f.

      • setProgress

        public SnackProgressBarManager setProgress(int progress)
        Sets the progress for SnackProgressBar of TYPE_DETERMINATE that is currently showing. It will also update the progress in % if it is shown.
        Parameters:
        progress - Progress of the ProgressBar.

      • setProgressBarColor

        public SnackProgressBarManager setProgressBarColor(@ColorRes
                                                   int colorId)
        Sets the ProgressBar color.
        Parameters:
        colorId - R.color id.
        See Also:
        PROGRESSBAR_COLOR_DEFAULT

      • setViewsToMove

        public SnackProgressBarManager setViewsToMove(android.view.View[] viewsToMove)
        Passes the views (e.g. FloatingActionButton) to move up or down as SnackProgressBar is shown or dismissed.

        This is not required for FloatingActionButton if a CoordinatorLayout is provided, but will be required for other layout types. This can be used to animate any views besides FloatingActionButton as well.

        Parameters:
        viewsToMove - Views to be animated along with the SnackProgressBar.

      • setViewToMove

        public SnackProgressBarManager setViewToMove(android.view.View viewToMove)
        Passes the view (e.g. FloatingActionButton) to move up or down as SnackProgressBar is shown or dismissed.

        This is not required for FloatingActionButton if a CoordinatorLayout is provided, but will be required for other layout types. This can be used to animate any view besides FloatingActionButton as well.

        Parameters:
        viewToMove - View to be animated along with the SnackProgressBar.

      • show

        public void show(int storeId,
                 int duration)
        Shows the SnackProgressBar based on its storeId with the specified duration. If another SnackProgressBar is already showing, this SnackProgressBar will be queued and shown accordingly after those queued are dismissed.
        Parameters:
        storeId - StoreId of the SnackProgressBar stored in SnackProgressBarManager.
        duration - Duration to show the SnackProgressBar of either LENGTH_SHORT, LENGTH_LONG, LENGTH_INDEFINITE or any positive millis.
        See Also:
        put(SnackProgressBar, int)

      • show

        public void show(int storeId,
                 int duration,
                 int onDisplayId)
        Shows the SnackProgressBar based on its storeId with the specified duration. If another SnackProgressBar is already showing, this SnackProgressBar will be queued and shown accordingly after those queued are dismissed.
        Parameters:
        storeId - StoreId of the SnackProgressBar stored in SnackProgressBarManager.
        duration - Duration to show the SnackProgressBar of either LENGTH_SHORT, LENGTH_LONG, LENGTH_INDEFINITE or any positive millis.
        onDisplayId - OnDisplayId attached to the SnackProgressBar when implementing the OnDisplayListener.
        See Also:
        put(SnackProgressBar, int)

      • show

        public void show(@NonNull
                 SnackProgressBar snackProgressBar,
                 int duration)
        Shows the SnackProgressBar with the specified duration. If another SnackProgressBar is already showing, this SnackProgressBar will be queued and shown accordingly after those queued are dismissed.
        Parameters:
        snackProgressBar - SnackProgressBar to be shown.
        duration - Duration to show the SnackProgressBar of either LENGTH_SHORT, LENGTH_LONG, LENGTH_INDEFINITE or any positive millis.

      • show

        public void show(@NonNull
                 SnackProgressBar snackProgressBar,
                 int duration,
                 int onDisplayId)
        Shows the SnackProgressBar with the specified duration. If another SnackProgressBar is already showing, this SnackProgressBar will be queued and shown accordingly after those queued are dismissed.
        Parameters:
        snackProgressBar - SnackProgressBar to be shown.
        duration - Duration to show the SnackProgressBar of either LENGTH_SHORT, LENGTH_LONG, LENGTH_INDEFINITE or any positive millis.
        onDisplayId - OnDisplayId attached to the SnackProgressBar when implementing the OnDisplayListener.

      • updateTo

        public void updateTo(int storeId)
        Updates the currently showing SnackProgressBar without dismissing it to the SnackProgressBar with the corresponding storeId i.e. updating without animation. Note: This does not change the queue.
        Parameters:
        storeId - StoreId of the SnackProgressBar stored in SnackProgressBarManager.

      • updateTo

        public void updateTo(@NonNull
                     SnackProgressBar snackProgressBar)
        Updates the currently showing SnackProgressBar without dismissing it to the new SnackProgressBar i.e. updating without animation. Note: This does not change the queue.
        Parameters:
        snackProgressBar - SnackProgressBar to be updated to.
